name: ListLocationCustomAttributes
description:
Retrieve custom attributes for a specific location.

This tool retrieves custom attributes associated with a specific location from Square. Optionally, custom attribute definitions can be included. It returns attributes visible to the requester, including those with varying visibility settings.

parameters.name: location_id
parameters.description: The ID of the target location to retrieve custom attributes for.

parameters.name: filter_by_visibility
parameters.description: Filters custom attribute definitions by visibility values. Options include 'ALL', 'READ', or 'READ_WRITE'.

value_schema.description: Filters the `CustomAttributeDefinition` results by their `visibility` values.

parameters.name: maximum_results_limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return in a single response. Valid range: 1 to 100. Default is 20.

value_schema.description:
The maximum number of results to return in a single paged response. This limit is advisory.
The response might contain more or fewer results. The minimum value is 1 and the maximum value is 100.
The default value is 20. For more information, see [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination).

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: The cursor for fetching the next page of results in a paginated response.

value_schema.description:
The cursor returned in the paged response from the previous call to this endpoint.
Provide this cursor to retrieve the next page of results for your original request. For more
information, see [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination).

parameters.name: include_custom_attribute_definitions
parameters.description: Set to true to include custom attribute definitions, providing name, description, and data type details. Defaults to false.

value_schema.description:
Indicates whether to return the [custom attribute definition](entity:CustomAttributeDefinition) in the `definition` field of each
custom attribute. Set this parameter to `true` to get the name and description of each custom
attribute, information about the data type, or other definition details. The default value is `false`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: visibility_filter
parameters.description: Filters the `CustomAttributeDefinition` results by their `visibility` values.

value_schema.description: Filters the `CustomAttributeDefinition` results by their `visibility` values.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
The maximum number of results to return in a single paged response. This limit is advisory.
The response might contain more or fewer results. The minimum value is 1 and the maximum value is 100.
The default value is 20. For more information, see [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination).

value_schema.description:
The maximum number of results to return in a single paged response. This limit is advisory.
The response might contain more or fewer results. The minimum value is 1 and the maximum value is 100.
The default value is 20. For more information, see [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination).

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description:
The cursor returned in the paged response from the previous call to this endpoint.
Provide this cursor to retrieve the next page of results for your original request. For more
information, see [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination).

value_schema.description:
The cursor returned in the paged response from the previous call to this endpoint.
Provide this cursor to retrieve the next page of results for your original request. For more
information, see [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination).

parameters.name: with_definitions
parameters.description:
Indicates whether to return the [custom attribute definition](entity:CustomAttributeDefinition) in the `definition` field of each
custom attribute. Set this parameter to `true` to get the name and description of each custom
attribute, information about the data type, or other definition details. The default value is `false`.

value_schema.description:
Indicates whether to return the [custom attribute definition](entity:CustomAttributeDefinition) in the `definition` field of each
custom attribute. Set this parameter to `true` to get the name and description of each custom
attribute, information about the data type, or other definition details. The default value is `false`.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
